name: Junk Space
description:
Two people pilot space ships armed with magnetic pulling devices that can attract the junk in Planet Florida's orbit. Their goal is to collect as much junk as possible and deliver it to the shuttle. The winner is whoever delivers more junk, but players can launch junk at each other to gain an advantage.
